ygData.subject: Re: Here is what I did (was:RE: [eqbards] [egbarts] Changing computer s)
ygData.msgSnippet: Lemme find the URL for ATI s win2k pages.. Hmm.  The only win2k drivers they have that are newer than the ones on the Win2k CD are beta drivers. Of course.. it
ygData.messageBody:
Lemme find the URL for ATI's win2k pages..

Hmm. The only win2k drivers they have that are newer than the ones on the
Win2k CD are beta drivers.

Of course.. it couldn't do any worse than the ones you're using, right? :)

http://www.ati.com/na/pages/spdrivers/index.html

The win2k section is about halfway down the page.

As a side note.. you should go to the websites for ALL the hardware
components you have.. video card, sound card, etc and see if they have new
drivers out.


> From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
> I am using what ever Win2K loaded when it detected my video hardware
during
> the install of Win2k. Is there something different to get and load? What
> driver should I be using?.
>
> Sylly
>
> p.s. it seems to have to do with being online. I can run the tutorial
> program just fine.
